career_1.title: Data Analyst
career_1.description: Interpret data and turn it into information that can offer ways to improve a business.
career_1.education: Bachelor's in Statistics, Economics, or related field

career_2.title: Graphic Designer
career_2.description: Create visual concepts to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, and captivate consumers.
career_2.education: Bachelor's in Design or Fine Arts

career_3.title: Physiotherapist
career_3.description: Help people affected by injury, illness or disability through movement and exercise.

career_4.title: Teacher (Secondary School)
career_4.description: Teach students in one or more subjects in public or private schools at the secondary level.

career_5.title: Marketing Manager
career_5.description: Plan, direct, or coordinate marketing policies and programs.
